tool_description:
This is an Apex Legends Weapon Stats API.
https://github.com/ItsSpres/Apex-Legends-Weapon-Stats-API
name: Apex Legends Weapon Stats
title: Apex Legends Weapon Stats

api_list.name: GET Weapon Stats
api_list.description: This will return all the weapons.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apex-legends-weapon-stats1.p.rapidapi.com/weapons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apex-legends-weapon-stats1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apex-legends-weapon-stats1.p.rapidapi.com/weapons"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apex-legends-weapon-stats1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
